text: H: Transmitted to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).
H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Pierick excused (2).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1).  Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Awa).  Excused, 0 (none).
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 40).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 40) as amended in (CD 1).

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Garrett, Hashem, Lamosao, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Hashimoto, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Wednesday 04-23-25 3:10PM in conference room 229.
S: Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-22-25 1:30PM; Conference Room 229.
H: Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 828).
S: Senate Conferees Appointed: Kim Chair; Hashimoto Co-Chair; Fevella.
S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 732).
H: House Conferees Appointed: Garrett, Hashem, Lamosao Co-Chairs; Shimizu.
H: Re-referred to HED, WAL, FIN, referral sheet 31
S: Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 559).
H: House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
H: Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No.  537) in amended form (SD 1).
S: Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 2 (Senator(s) Awa, DeCorte).  Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: One Day Notice 04-03-25.
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1514) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.

S: The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, DeCoite, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-31-25 10:02AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
S: Reported from HRE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1131) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.

S: The committee(s) on  HRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HRE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Kidani, Hashimoto; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga, Fevella.
S: The committee(s) on HRE has scheduled a public hearing on 03-13-25 3:05PM; Conference Room 229 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to HRE, WAM.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 179).
H: Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Pierick, Ward excused (2).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday,  03-04-25.
H: Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1030) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.

H: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lamosao, Lee, M., Miyake, Morikawa, Templo, Alcos, Reyes Oda; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Hussey, Ward.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 02-24-25 2:00PM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Pierick voting no (1) and Representative(s) Belatti, Cochran, Kila, Ward excused (4).
H: Reported from HED (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 295), recommending referral to FIN.

H: The committee on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Garrett, Amato, Evslin, Kapela, Kila, La Chica, Olds, Sayama, Woodson, Muraoka, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by HED on Wednesday, 02-05-25 2:00PM in House conference room 309 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on HED with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Ward excused (2).
H: Reported from WAL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 17) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to HED.

H: The committee on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Lamosao, Belatti, Ichiyama, Iwamoto, Morikawa, Poepoe, Shimizu, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Woodson.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by WAL on Tuesday, 01-28-25 9:00AM in House conference room 411 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Referred to WAL, HED, FIN, referral sheet 1
H: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
H: Prefiled.
